name: Shortcodes for Elementor
author: RSTheme

sections.description:
Insert your elementor pages and sections templates anywhere using shortcodes fro elementor. Using this pluign you can make global elments with shortcode. This shortcode you can use anywere inside Elementor builder.

Use shortcode SHORTCODE_ELEMENTOR eg: [SHORTCODE_ELEMENTOR id=xxxxx]

Parameter ‚Äúxxxx‚Äù is id of any post created using Elementor Builder.

You can check also our RSElemets Elementor plugin for more widgets that will help you easily create site using elementor.

üî• You may like other plugins from RSTheme:

RSElements Addon For Elementor – RSElements Addon is a collection of powerful widgets that works perfectly with Elementor page builder.

RS Logo Showcase – Logo Showcase is a lightweight & Responsive plugin to Display a list of clients, supporters, partners or sponsors logos in your WordPress website .

Ultimate Team Showcase – Ultimate team showcase is a most flexible and industry-leading WordPress plugin. It is built to create and manage team members with excellent multipurpose design and multiple options. It‚Äôs easy to customize and developer friendly. It is responsive and mobile friendly.

Author

Designed and Developed with ‚ô• by RSTheme

Requirements

WordPress version at least: 4.5 
PHP version at least: 7.4 or higher
sections.installation:
It’s really easy to install Shortcodes for Elementor plugin but before installing this make sure you’ve installed Elementor. Elementor is the only dependency.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen in WordPress.
  2. Search for Shortcodes for Elementor.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it.

Manual Installation

  1. Download RS <a href=”#””>Elementor Shortcode.
  2. Extract the elementor-shortcode.zip file. You‚Äôll get plugin files inside rs-shortcode-lite directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elementor-shortcode directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‚ÄòPlugins‚Äô screen in WordPress.
